name: Data Analysis Workflow
description: Complete workflow for automated data analysis using AI Provider Assistants with code interpreter, file search, and statistical analysis capabilities

workflow.title: Comprehensive Data Analysis Workflow
workflow.description: End-to-end workflow for performing statistical analysis, data visualization, and generating insights using AI Provider Assistants

overview.purpose: Demonstrate how to create and use a data analysis assistant for comprehensive statistical analysis, visualization, and reporting

step_1.title: Create Data Analysis Assistant
step_1.description: Set up an assistant with data analysis capabilities

code.example:
// Create a specialized data analysis assistant
const assistant = await openai.beta.assistants.create({
  name: "Data Analysis Expert",
  instructions: `You are an expert data analyst with advanced statistical knowledge.

Your capabilities:
- Perform comprehensive data analysis using Python
- Create professional visualizations with matplotlib, seaborn, plotly
- Conduct statistical tests and hypothesis testing
- Generate executive summaries and insights
- Handle multiple data formats (CSV, Excel, JSON, etc.)
- Perform time series analysis and forecasting
- Create correlation and regression analyses

Always:
1. Start with data exploration and quality assessment
2. Provide clear explanations of your methodology
3. Include statistical significance and confidence intervals
4. Create publication-ready visualizations
5. Summarize key findings and actionable insights
6. Suggest next steps for further analysis

For each analysis:
- Show descriptive statistics
- Check for missing values and outliers
- Validate assumptions for statistical tests
- Provide both statistical and practical significance
- Include data quality assessment`,
  model: "gpt-4",
  tools: [
    { type: "code_interpreter" },
    { type: "file_search" }
  ],
  metadata: {
    purpose: "data-analysis",
    version: "2.0",
    specialization: "statistical-analysis"
  }
});

console.log(`Created data analysis assistant: ${assistant.id}`);

notes: Code interpreter enables Python execution for statistical analysis
File search allows processing of uploaded datasets
Instructions emphasize statistical rigor and clear communication

step_2.title: Upload and Prepare Dataset
step_2.description: Upload data files and create a vector store for file search
notes: Multiple file formats supported for comprehensive analysis
Vector store enables semantic search across datasets
File batch upload is efficient for multiple files

step_3.title: Create Analysis Thread and Initial Exploration
step_3.description: Start the analysis with data exploration and quality assessment
notes: Comprehensive exploration covers data quality and initial insights
Request includes both technical analysis and business-friendly explanations
Thread metadata helps track analysis progress

step_4.title: Perform Statistical Analysis
step_4.description: Conduct detailed statistical tests and hypothesis testing

code.example:
// Wait for exploration to complete, then perform statistical analysis
const statisticalAnalysisMessage = await openai.beta.threads.messages.create(thread.id, {
  role: "user",
  content: `Based on the initial exploration, please perform detailed statistical analysis:

1. **Hypothesis Testing**:
   - Test for significant differences in sales performance across regions
   - Analyze seasonal patterns and trends
   - Compare customer segments for statistical significance
   - Test correlation between marketing spend and sales

2. **Regression Analysis**:
   - Build predictive models for sales forecasting
   - Identify key drivers of sales performance
   - Assess model fit and statistical significance
   - Provide confidence intervals for predictions

3. **Advanced Analytics**:
   - Perform customer segmentation analysis
   - Conduct cohort analysis if applicable
   - Analyze customer lifetime value patterns
   - Identify outliers and their business impact

4. **Statistical Validation**:
   - Check assumptions for all statistical tests
   - Provide p-values and effect sizes
   - Include confidence intervals
   - Assess practical vs statistical significance

Please include both the statistical code and business interpretations.`
});

const statisticalRun = await openai.beta.threads.runs.create(thread.id, {
  assistant_id: assistant.id,
  instructions: "Ensure all statistical tests are properly validated and include clear business implications."
});

console.log(`Started statistical analysis: ${statisticalRun.id}`);

notes: Includes both technical validation and business interpretation
Covers multiple analysis types for comprehensive insights

step_5.title: Generate Visualizations and Reports
step_5.description: Create professional visualizations and comprehensive reports

code.example:
// Request comprehensive visualization and reporting
const reportingMessage = await openai.beta.threads.messages.create(thread.id, {
  role: "user",
  content: `Please create a comprehensive analysis report with professional visualizations:

1. **Executive Dashboard**:
   - Key performance indicators (KPIs) summary
   - High-level trends and insights
   - Critical findings requiring immediate attention
   - ROI and business impact metrics

2. **Detailed Visualizations**:
   - Interactive charts showing sales trends over time
   - Geographic performance heatmaps
   - Customer segment analysis charts
   - Correlation matrices and scatter plots
   - Forecasting charts with confidence bands

3. **Statistical Summary**:
   - Summary table of all statistical tests performed
   - Effect sizes and practical significance
   - Model performance metrics
   - Assumptions validation results

4. **Business Recommendations**:
   - Actionable insights based on the analysis
   - Prioritized recommendations with expected impact
   - Areas for further investigation
   - Next steps and implementation suggestions

5. **Technical Appendix**:
   - Detailed methodology explanation
   - Code snippets for reproducibility
   - Data quality assessment results
   - Limitations and caveats

Please ensure all visualizations are publication-ready and include proper titles, labels, and legends.`
});

const reportRun = await openai.beta.threads.runs.create(thread.id, {
  assistant_id: assistant.id,
  instructions: "Create professional, publication-ready visualizations and provide clear, actionable business recommendations."
});

console.log(`Started report generation: ${reportRun.id}`);

notes: Combines technical analysis with business-focused reporting
Includes both executive summary and technical details

step_6.title: Monitor and Retrieve Results
step_6.description: Monitor analysis progress and retrieve comprehensive results
notes: Automatic extraction and organization of results
Downloads all generated files (charts, reports, etc.)

data_preparation: Always validate data quality before analysis
Handle missing values appropriately for your use case
Document data transformations and cleaning steps
Maintain data lineage and version control
statistical_rigor: Check assumptions for all statistical tests
Use appropriate sample sizes for reliable results
Report both statistical and practical significance
Include confidence intervals and effect sizes
visualization: Choose appropriate chart types for your data
Include clear titles, labels, and legends
Use consistent color schemes and formatting
Provide context and interpretation for charts
reporting: Start with executive summary for stakeholders
Provide both technical details and business insights

large_datasets.solution: Split data into chunks or use sampling techniques

memory_errors.problem: Out of memory errors during analysis
memory_errors.solution: Use streaming processing or reduce data dimensionality
memory_errors.code:
// Use pandas chunking for large files
pd.read_csv('large_file.csv', chunksize=1000)

statistical_assumptions.solution: Use non-parametric alternatives or data transformations

tips: Use appropriate data types to reduce memory usage
Cache intermediate results for complex analyses
Use parallel processing for independent analyses
Implement progressive analysis for large datasets

database_integration.description: Connect to databases for live data analysis
database_integration.code:
// Example: Connect to PostgreSQL for live analysis
const analysisMessage = `
Connect to our PostgreSQL database and analyze:
- Table: sales_transactions
- Date range: Last 90 days
- Metrics: Revenue, customer count, average order value

Connection details will be provided securely.
`;

api_integration.description: Integrate with external APIs for enriched analysis
api_integration.code:
// Example: Enrich analysis with external market data
const enrichedAnalysis = `
Perform sales analysis and enrich with:
- Market trend data from external API
- Economic indicators
- Competitor benchmarking data

Provide comparative analysis and market positioning insights.
`;
